author: Daniel S
comment: Oct 2017 Review.  Perfect for what I want. very customizable.  Can have many options for ambient display..  colors and complications.  Only wish i could display more info with digital clock..  but best overall option by far! ** request ** ability to add custom color chooser ?

reply.author: Marcelo R. dos Santos
reply.content:
Thank you for the rating and comment.

I will try to implement the color chooser option, but I am afraid it could let the app more complex and destabilize it's structure (I mean, in code). Cause everything related to colors are based on fixed color codes.

I won't guarantee this options in future version but I promise I will try to implement.

author: Peter Böhm
comment: This is a really good watch face. I just have one question about burn in protection for OLED watches. I am not sure if I can see the watch face shifting around by a couple of pixels or not. Can you help?

reply.author: Marcelo R. dos Santos
reply.content:
Thank you.
Actually it doesn't shift around, if burn in is on, it only draws a fewer pixels.
